name: Security & Auth
description: A2A agents demonstrating authentication, authorization, and secure agent communication patterns.

agentNotes.a2a-sample-headless-agent-auth: Official sample for headless authentication without user interaction
agentNotes.a2a-sample-magic-8-ball-security: Java example demonstrating secure agent communication patterns
agentNotes.a2a-agents-secure-verification-poc: Formal verification ensuring agent behavior meets security specifications
agentNotes.a2a-sample-signing-and-verifying: Cryptographic signing and verification for trusted agent messages
agentNotes.secure-rag-multi-agent: RAG with JWT security and role-based access control
agentNotes.a2a-scanner: Scans agents for threats and security policy violations
agentNotes.ziran: Red team agent uncovering vulnerabilities through adversarial testing
agentNotes.capiscio-sdk-python: Always-on runtime security middleware for production deployments
